'''Natlan Saurians''' are an enemy group.

Currently, there are six types of Saurians, each affiliated with a corresponding tribe. Adult Saurians can be [[Saurian Indwelling|indwelled]], which allows the player to control them. Saurians indwelled this way do not award [[Character EXP]], [[Character Ascension Material]]s or [[Mora]].

* {{Enemy|Iktomisaurus Chick}}
* {{Enemy|Tatankasaur Whelp}}

==Drops==
{{Drops|Natlan Saurian}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|The Saurians that inhabit the land of Natlan.<br>According to legend, more ancient dragons were better able to adapt to their environments, taking on different shapes and forms based on their surroundings. It is said that after losing their power, they were forced to become ever more dependent on their environments for survival, finally settling into the forms they still have as Saurians today.<br>But whether this is true or not, no one really knows.|[[Adventurer Handbook]]}}
